text: Wayside School is a book series of children's chapter books. They are written by Louis Sachar, who also wrote Holes, a book that won the National Book Award for Young People's Literature. ==Books== The books in the Wayside School series are * Sideways Stories from Wayside School (which was published in 1978) * Wayside School is Falling Down (which was published in 1989) * Sideways Arithmetic from Wayside School (which was published in 1989) * More Sideways Arithmetic from Wayside School (which was published in 1994) * Wayside School Gets a Little Stranger (which was published in 1995) * Wayside School Beneath the Cloud of Doom (which was published in 2020) Category:Series of books Category:American children's books
title: Wayside School
